name: Cluster Pod Capacity
description:
Summary metrics about containers running on Kubernetes nodes.

Dashboard was taken from here.  This version does not reqiure you to
setup the Kubernetes-app plugin. (https://github.com/grafana/kubernetes-app)

Use this Helm chart to launch Grafana into a Kubernetes cluster.  It will include this dashboard and many more dashboards to give you visibility into the Kubernetes Cluster. (https://github.com/sekka1/cloud-public/tree/master/kubernetes/pods/grafana-helm)
